title: Constant lag spikes
body:
so I get lag spikes throughout every game and I would like to know if there is anything I can do to fix this or improve on this. I would really like to play but I don't think it would be smart to in these conditions. Here is what I have.

Speedtest.net results: 12ms ping, 15.95 mbps download speed, and 2.26 mbps upload speed.

Computer: Asus E5-571 laptop with i5 core and  something like 1.7 GHz up to 2.7 GHz with turbo boost. 

In game:  Generally I have about 60 fps and 72 ms. But it jumps up throughout the game.

Now I don't know computers real well but I would think that I would have enough power and internet speed to be able to play LoL without lag but I constantly have lag spikes throughout the game. Basically when abilities are used and during team fights I lag out for a few seconds at a time. And At times I feel like I am affected when last hitting minions. Now it's not just every once and a while but constantly throughout the entire game from start to finish.

replies.body:
Bear in mind that your speedtest results only apply to your speed/latency to their servers and your speed/latency to *our servers* will look quite a bit different because they're located in different geolocations.

I recommend working through the steps listed in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), as they will assist you in getting your local network compatible with League. Let me know if you continue to experience issues after working through those steps.
